items.title: Options Markets Show Traders Reposition as Mideast Tension Fades
items.description: (Bloomberg) -- Stocks hit record highs last week and energy futures retreated after Middle East tensions eased. But in some parts of the options markets, there are still signs of stress as investors position for potential geopolitical and macroeconomic upsets.
